Eau_Claire.WAYY:
WAYY (790 AM) is a radio station in the Eau Claire area of Wisconsin, with its studio/offices located in Altoona, Wisconsin. Its transmitter is located in Eau Claire, Wisconsin.


== History ==
The station was originally at 1150 on the AM dial, and from the 1950s-1970s was known as WAXX. The station played current pop, then converted to country music in 1966.
